dialogue: Got any spare caps? No? Then get out of my face.
I saw a Deathclaw yesterday. Swear to Atom, it was wearing a hat.
Don't drink the water out by Old Olney. Glows in the dark.
You look like you've seen better days. Or maybe just cleaner ones.
War... war never changes. But the price of whiskey sure does.
I used to be an adventurer like you, then I took a laser to the knee.
Patrolling the Mojave almost makes you wish for a nuclear winter. Wait, wrong wasteland.
Tunnel Snakes rule! Or they did, back in the vault.
Keep your hands where I can see them. I've been robbed twice today.
You buying? I'm selling. Just kidding, I'm broke.
The Brotherhood? Bunch of tin cans playing soldier if you ask me.
Enclave radio has better music, but Three Dog has better news.
I heard there's a city of kids somewhere. Little lamplight or something.
If you see a Ghoul, shoot first. If it talks, apologize later.
My Brahmin ran off. If you see a two-headed cow, tell her I miss her.
This bar is the only thing keeping me sane. And the Jet. Mostly the Jet.
I found a pre-war book once. Ate it. Tasted like dust.
You ever wonder what the moon looks like up close? Probably full of commies.
Don't go north. Slavers everywhere. Unless you're into that sort of thing.
I'm just here for the noodles. They got noodles, right?
Hey smoothskin, got a light?
Watch your step on the way out. I think I dropped a mine somewhere.
The water purifier project? Sounds like a pipe dream.
I'd kill for a Nuka-Cola Quantum. Literally.
You looking for info? Talk to the Ear in the corner. Not me.
I saw a UFO crash last week. Green blood everywhere.
Gary? Gary!
Don't feed the Yao Guai. That's how I lost my hand.
I'm saving up for a trip to Rivet City. Hear they got a real doctor there.
Life's a bitch, then you die. Then you get eaten by a radroach.
